data.title: Movie Experience in 4K Digitial
data.meta_description: Discover a world of captivating films at the Giant Screen Experience. Check out our showtimes and enjoy educational, classic, and premier studio movies!
data.text:
Kinetosaur: The Legacy of John Payne

Classic Film | Runtime: 35 minutes

August 16-18, August 23-25, August 30-September 2, September 6-8 | All shows at 4:45 p.m.

*August 18 show starts at 5:00 p.m.

Get to know the tenacious metal-forging artist behind the Dinosaurs in Motion exhibit in this new heartfelt documentary. Discover how sculptor John Payne created 14 massive, fully interactive, recycled metal dinosaur sculptures inspired by actual fossils — while simultaneously transforming his gritty mountain town into a haven for artists.

SHOWTIMES & TICKETS WATCH THE TRAILER

Jurassic World

Classic Film | Runtime: 2 hours

Friday, August 23, 2024 at 7:00 p.m.

Two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure!

SHOWTIMES & TICKETS WATCH THE TRAILER

Encanto

Classic Film | Runtime: 1 hour 40 minutes

Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 2:00 p.m.

A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

Tickets available soon.

WATCH THE TRAILER

Cities of the Future

Traditional Film | Runtime: 40 minutes

Imagine stepping 50 years into the future and finding smart cities designed to be totally sustainable. Renewable energy is our primary power source, space-based solar power provides energy 24 hours a day, everything is recycled, and you have your own pod that runs on maglev trains using little or no energy. You can also ride an electric flying vehicle! Traffic jams are a thing of the past. This isn’t science fiction. Engineers are making plans for a sustainable world right now.

Closed captioning available upon request. Select showtimes playing in 3D.

SHOWTIMES & TICKETS WATCH THE TRAILER

Secrets of the Sea

Traditional Film | Runtime: 40 minutes

Secrets of the Sea takes you face-to-face with an astonishing array of marine critters, showing the fascinating ways they interact with each other and the environment. Featuring more than 70 marine species from all over the world, Secrets of the Sea reveals the many wonders and mysteries of our ocean world and demonstrates the critical importance of marine biodiversity to keeping our oceans healthy.

Closed captioning available upon request. Select showtimes playing in 3D.

SHOWTIMES & TICKETS WATCH THE TRAILER

T. REX

Traditional Film | Runtime: 40 minutes

Working with top tyrannosaur scientists, a coalition of natural history institutions, and pioneering paleo and visual effects artists, filmmakers explore new scientific discoveries to bring the most dazzling and accurate T.REX documentary ever made!

Closed captioning available upon request. Select showtimes playing in 3D.

SHOWTIMES & TICKETS WATCH THE TRAILER
